Class com.google.api.client.util.Base64

Documentation changed from old to new.

Change from deprecated to undeprecated.

Removed Methods
byte[] decode(byte[], int, int) Low-level access to decoding ASCII characters in the form of a byte array.
byte[] decode(byte[]) Low-level access to decoding ASCII characters in the form of a byte array.
byte[] encode(byte[], int, int) Similar to .encode(byte[], int, int) but returns a byte array instead of instantiating a String.
byte[] encode(byte[]) Similar to .encode(byte[]) but returns a byte array instead of instantiating a String.
 

Added Methods
byte[] decodeBase64(byte[]) Decodes Base64 data into octets.
byte[] decodeBase64(String) Decodes a Base64 String into octets.
byte[] encodeBase64(byte[]) Encodes binary data using the base64 algorithm but does not chunk the output.
String encodeBase64String(byte[]) Encodes binary data using the base64 algorithm but does not chunk the output.
byte[] encodeBase64URLSafe(byte[]) Encodes binary data using a URL-safe variation of the base64 algorithm but does not chunk the output.
String encodeBase64URLSafeString(byte[]) Encodes binary data using a URL-safe variation of the base64 algorithm but does not chunk the output.
